goal.en: “Learning the basic knowledge of differentiation and integration for establishing the ability of formulating, solving and interpreting the results of problems involving applications“
goal.ch: “學習微分與積分的基本知識, 培養列式, 求解及解釋問題的應用能力“

content.en:
In this course, we will study the following topics:
6. Additional Integration Topics
7. Multivariable Calculus
8. Differential Equations
9. Taylor Polynomials and Infinite Series
10. Probability and Calculus
content.ch:
In this course, we will study the following topics:
6. Additional Integration Topics
7. Multivariable Calculus
8. Differential Equations
9. Taylor Polynomials and Infinite Series
10. Probability and Calculus

textbook.en: Calculus for Business, Economics, Life Sciences, and Social Sciences, Global Edition, 14E. Barnett.
textbook.ch: Calculus for Business, Economics, Life Sciences, and Social Sciences, Global Edition, 14E. Barnett.

grading.en: quizzes 10％ homeworks 10％ midterm Ⅳ 25％ midterm Ⅴ 25％ midterm Ⅵ 30％ Python homeworks 5％ others 5％
grading.ch: 小考 10％ 作業 10％ 會考四25％ 會考五25％ 會考六30％ Python作業5％ 其他5％

flex_desc.en: 第17、18週彈性教學規劃如下： 每位同學每學年，將執行微積分上機演習短期課程，共9小時及上、下學期Python自學課程與作業繳交(每學期3次，共6次)，合計9小時，總計18小時。成績評量方式如紙本授課計畫-配分標準所示。
flex_desc.ch: 第17、18週彈性教學規劃如下： 每位同學每學年，將執行微積分上機演習短期課程，共9小時及上、下學期Python自學課程與作業繳交(每學期3次，共6次)，合計9小時，總計18小時。成績評量方式如紙本授課計畫-配分標準所示。
